findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information, leading to potential risks if information is disclosed after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may expose the Receiving Party to significant risks if the Disclosing Party misuses this provision.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignments to only those with prior written consent may hinder necessary business transactions or reorganizations.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
